statements: SELECT * FROM Smart_Cities_Demographics;
SELECT city_name, population FROM Smart_Cities_Demographics;
SELECT city_name, median_income FROM Smart_Cities_Demographics WHERE population > 100000;
SELECT city_id, population FROM Smart_Cities_Demographics ORDER BY median_income DESC;
SELECT * FROM Smart_Cities_Demographics WHERE city_name LIKE 'New%';
SELECT city_name, population FROM Smart_Cities_Demographics WHERE population > 100000 ORDER BY city_name DESC;
SELECT city_name, median_income FROM Smart_Cities_Demographics WHERE median_income > 50000 ORDER BY median_income ASC;
SELECT city_name, population, median_income FROM Smart_Cities_Demographics WHERE population BETWEEN 50000 AND 200000 ORDER BY population DESC, median_income ASC;
SELECT * FROM Smart_Cities_Demographics WHERE city_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY city_name ASC;
SELECT city_name, population FROM Smart_Cities_Demographics WHERE population < 50000 ORDER BY city_name ASC, population DESC;
SELECT city_id, city_name, population, median_income FROM city_demographics;
SELECT city_name, population, median_income, city_id FROM city_demographics;
SELECT population, city_name, median_income, city_id FROM city_demographics;
SELECT city_id, city_name FROM city_demographics;
SELECT city_name, median_income FROM city_demographics;
SELECT city_name, population FROM city_demographics ORDER BY city_name ASC;
SELECT city_name, median_income FROM city_demographics WHERE population > 100000 ORDER BY median_income DESC;
SELECT city_name, population, median_income FROM city_demographics WHERE median_income BETWEEN 50000 AND 75000 ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT city_name, population, resource_type, quantity FROM city_demographics JOIN resource_allocation ON city_demographics.city_id = resource_allocation.city_id WHERE resource_type = 'water';

SELECT city_name, population, resource_type, quantity FROM city_demographics JOIN resource_allocation ON city_demographics.city_id = resource_allocation.city_id WHERE quantity > 500 ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT * FROM demographics WHERE city='New York';
SELECT city, population FROM demographics WHERE population > 1000000;
SELECT city, median_age FROM demographics ORDER BY median_age DESC;
SELECT * FROM resources WHERE resource_type='water' ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT city, plan_details FROM urban_planning WHERE city='Los Angeles';
SELECT city, population FROM demographics ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT city, median_age FROM demographics WHERE median_age > 30 ORDER BY median_age ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT city, resource_type, quantity FROM resources WHERE resource_type = 'water' ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT city, plan_details FROM urban_planning WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY plan_id DESC;
SELECT city, population, quantity FROM demographics JOIN resources ON demographics.city = resources.city WHERE population > 100000 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM demographics ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT city_name, income FROM demographics WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT * FROM housing WHERE num_bedrooms >= 2 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT city_name, amenity_type, rating FROM amenities WHERE rating > 3 AND availability='Available';
SELECT property_id, price FROM housing WHERE city_name='New York' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM demographics;
SELECT city_name, age, gender FROM demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY gender DESC;
SELECT property_id, price, city_name FROM housing WHERE price BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT amenity_type, rating, city_name FROM amenities WHERE rating > 4 AND availability = 'Yes';
SELECT * FROM resources WHERE city_name = 'New York' AND status = 'Active';
SELECT city_name, population FROM city_demographics;
SELECT district_name, population, area_sq_km FROM district_demographics WHERE population > 100000;
SELECT neighborhood_name, area_sq_km FROM neighborhood_demographics WHERE area_sq_km < 5.0;
SELECT category_name FROM demographic_categories ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT data_id, data_value, data_year FROM demographic_data WHERE data_year = 2021;
SELECT city_name, population FROM city_demographics;
SELECT district_name, area_sq_km FROM district_demographics ORDER BY district_id DESC;
SELECT neighborhood_name, population, area_sq_km FROM neighborhood_demographics WHERE population > 5000;
SELECT category_name, AVG(data_value) AS average_value FROM demographic_categories JOIN demographic_data ON demographic_categories.category_id = demographic_data.category_id GROUP BY category_name;

SELECT city_name, district_name, neighborhood_name, data_value FROM city_demographics JOIN district_demographics ON city_demographics.city_id = district_demographics.city_id JOIN neighborhood_demographics ON district_demographics.district_id = neighborhood_demographics.district_id JOIN demographic_data ON city_demographics.city_id = demographic_data.city_id AND district_demographics.district_id = demographic_data.district_id AND neighborhood_demographics.neighborhood_id = demographic_data.neighborhood_id;
